remarks: Function mapping a set to the class of all closed (internal binary) operations for this set, see definition in section 1.2 of [Hall] p. 2, definition in section I.1 of [Bruck] p. 1, or definition 1 in [BourbakiAlg1] p. 1, where it is called "a law of composition". (Contributed by AV, 20-Jan-2020.)
statement: df-clintop $p |- clIntOp = ( m e. _V |-> ( m intOp m ) ) $.
